description:
The team realizes that the O`bli can now travel into the real world, which opens up many implications for the safety of humanity. Meanwhile, the Origami sisters seem to have disappeared, and no one knows where they could have gone. It`s only a matter of time before Morgana shows up again, too...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Change! The Three Sisters Have Disappeared
Grand retournement ! Les trois sœurs disparues
急転! 消えた三姉妹
